name: Don't Touch Me!!
description:
→ A cute relaxing endless minigame.

  • You need to try and keep your finger/ mouse on the button for as long as possible.
  • The button moves and speeds up with time.
  • Has a sweet background song track which starts in sync with the game.

How to Play : Keep your finger/ hold down your cursor at the center of the green button.

Note : The Words Jumping around when you lose are the Restart Button.

                               ◦•●◉✿ Ⓓⓞⓝ'ⓣ Ⓣⓞⓤⓒⓗ Ⓜⓔ!! ✿◉●•◦

♥creator's comment : this was my first ever game. I will always love this game♥

⭐Set a highscore based on Time and Speed (Post it in the comments)⭐
